title: Revisiting the 1,3-azadiene-succinic anhydride annulation reaction for the stereocontrolled synthesis of allylic 2-oxopyrrolidines bearing up to four contiguous stereocenters
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16678-16684
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03156C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Timothy K. Beng, Jasleen Kaur, Ifeyinwa S. Anosike, Benjamin Rentfro, Shae Newgard
A flexible strategy, which unites succinic anhydride and 1,3-azadienes to produce allylic 2-pyrrolidinones bearing contiguous stereocenters is described.
